> " Rodimus, if ever there were a time for courage and strength, =
it is now. You have within you the power to relight the flame, and all you =
need do, is look deeper into your heart. There you will find it, a power th=
at is perpetual, a power that is unmatched by anything ever devised in the =
universe, and a one true power that as Autobots, we share among each other.=
 Be not afraid to delve into this power, as I too am not afraid to do the s=
ame. My heart is here for you, all you need to is reach for it."

 Tucson's cab, a screen shows the image of a beating heart. As it beats fur=
ther, the inside of the cab glows a brilliant silvery blue light. A light t=
hat eminates from his heart, and a light that can not be doused by the forc=
es of evil.

<NEW>

wards Tuscon. The sound of their claws hitting the strange metaerial

 louder as several blue and white winged insects approach from
